reviews.tvSnippet: Returned wifi router. Service was quick and efficient. No hassle, no wasted time!
reviews.text: Returned wifi router. Service was quick and efficient. No hassle, no wasted time!

reviews.tvSnippet:
Excellent service which is what saves any situation.
I rely heavily on connectivity and our line speed had been bad for a while. We'd have the line reset, reboot the router, have good speeds and then it would drop shortly after.

On Friday morning I reported the issue via WhatsApp (very convenient!l). After attempting two line resets a ticket was logged at 12:00. At 12:15 I received a call from Marvel with the cause (hight traffic) and a solution (router upgrade). By 13:15 I collected my new router from Marvel at their offices.

Thanks for the continued support with your services.

Didn't give me a run around or a hard time regarding cancellation (due to moving, not service related) and answered my host of questions in about 5 minutes. More businesses need this. Well done Axxess and thanks Jared

reviews.tvSnippet: I used to think Axxess was one of the better ISP's out there and used to be happy with their service, but I have grown extremely disappointed in their customer service. They have certainly gone backwards. I now have 2 unresolved tickets that no one even bothers to reply to even when I follow up. Not mentioning their chats where the agents simply drop you. This on top of me experiencing intermittent connectivity and logging faults and complaints. Going on for months now. The only thing keeping me from cancelling was a glimmer of faith in past performance but sadly all trust and confidence have now dissipated. They are officially worse than Telkom and I'll be switching to another ISP.

Thank you, Xhanti, for the great service.

A big thank you to Chrizell at Axxess. You guys have been wonderful, quick to respond, quick to resolve issues, and easy to get hold of.
Having dealt with other providers before, you guys have been a breath of fresh air. Keep up the good work.

reviews.tvSnippet:
We bought a Grandstream handset from Axxess and it‚Äôs BEEN giving us problem for YEARS UPON YEARS. We tried to contact Axxcess to help us with this issue and the phone will receive phone calls for one day and the next day back to not working! It is affecting our business!! This is one of the emails I sent to them:

Good morning,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a SERIOUS ISSUE with your Grandstream handset that we should be using to receive phone calls but instead it does not ring and we only can make phone calls with it. I called your helpline 3 weeks back and spoke to numerous call centre agents and none of them managed to help. A specific agent I spoke to was a lady named Ntombi who managed to get the phone to ring for only one day then after that, it stopped working. I am not the only one from my company who has tried resolving this matter. It has been years upon years with us battling with this particular problem and Axxesss not hearing our demands for a service we pay every month for. We are losing valuable customers because of this and if this continues, we will have to cancel our service with Axxess and get better service and help elsewhere. On July the 11th at 3:31pm one of my co workers sent you the same query message that I am sending today and you did not respond to her email. I have called your helpline more than 15 times and I was put on hold for over 45 mins and they took down my number and said they will call me back but to this day, no one has called me yet. This problem has to be solved, enough is enough!

reviews.tvSnippet: Pathetic service.We have had technicians out to our property every 6 weeks over the past 18 months without them being able to fix the issue!!I had them here on Monday agai and the connection lasted until 11 am yesterday.I immediately logged a call and until now nobody has made contact at all.I work from home and have explained that to the call centre agent but nobody cares.I can understand why it is impossible to get hold of management.

reviews.tvSnippet:
The worst ISP experience I've had in a very long time.
For just over a year I have had countless issues with either intermittent access or days on end without any access at all (strangely each time over a weekend or public holiday (or both).
I gave notice for end October and didn't have access to my WiFi network from  the 29th.  I then discovered that they had CHANGED my WiFi password without my consent or knowledge.  I cannot help but wonder how many times they had done that over the past months, leaving me without access to a network that I had paid for!!
Steer very far away from this company!

reviews.tvSnippet: The worst customer service providers I've ever had the misfortune to deal with. Incompetent, rude and abrupt. Can't resolve your issue so they put you on hold for 1 hour!!! Bye Axxess, this was the last straw. Let's hope Afrihost will be better.
reviews.text: The worst customer service providers I've ever had the misfortune to deal with. Incompetent, rude and abrupt. Can't resolve your issue so they put you on hold for 1 hour!!! Bye Axxess, this was the last straw. Let's hope Afrihost will be better.

reviews.tvSnippet:
Axxess will lure you in with a promise that they do not believe in contracts and that your subscription with them is on a month-to-month basis and that you can cancel at any time should you not be happy with their services.

They promise ultra fast internet speeds: "Say goodbye to buffering and slow speeds". However, I got EXTREMELY frustrated with VERY slow internet speeds. This was resolved within two days, and I decided to pay my monthly fee of R425-00. However, the next day I was back to "snail pace" internet speeds. After only a week with them, I decided to cancel my subscription.

I distinctly remembered reading the following on their website:
Their answer to the question "Do I need to sign up for a contract?" reads as follows: "No siree! At Axxess, we don't like contracts. All our services are month-to-month and can be easily cancelled if you change your mind."

BUT, when I tried to cancel my internet subscription with Axxess, I was informed I had to pay a cancellation fee of R499-00 should I decide to cancel within the first 6 months after joining them.

When I went back to their web site to read the small print, I saw the following sentence: "*Cancellation fees may apply if signing up on a Promotional offer." I did not sign up for a promotional offer, but STILL they charge a cancellation fee?!? SHARKS!!!
reviews.text:

reviews.tvSnippet: I've had a smooth surfing year with the service. Satisfied with my home LTE package, issues experienced where dealt with and resolved professionally. Thank you Axxess. Will upgrade to fiber when it's available in my area.

reviews.tvSnippet: Axxess provides reliable fibre services with excellent speed and uptime, and minimal interruptions. Their fibre packages are well-regarded for their consistent speeds and no downtime. I love that their pricing is competitive, and I can roll over my unused CallTime for up to three months. The setup process was simple, and their app works perfectly for managing calls. Overall, Axxess is a solid choice for home users and small businesses prioritizing affordability, flexibility, and seamless communication backed by reliable fibre connectivity.

I love that their pricing is competitive, and I can roll over my unused CallTime for up to three months. The setup process was simple, and their app works perfectly for managing calls. Overall, Axxess is a solid choice for home users and small businesses prioritizing affordability, flexibility, and seamless communication backed by reliable fibre connectivity.

reviews.tvSnippet: No matter how many times I unsubscribe from their mailing list they keep bombarding me with spam. I never once signed up for any form of marketing from Axxess DSL (Pty) ltd. @axxess leave me alone! Stop harassing me

reviews.tvSnippet:
They have low speeds and unfair FUP (Fair Usage Policy).

I decided to cancel and they offered their useless 3 months retention deal. Half off! Of course I took it and now they won't cancel after the 3 months passes and want to keep me for an additional 2 months.

I struggle with their connection all the time and I thought during this retention period, they would do anything to try and retain me as a customer but nothing has changed thus my request to leave them!

They are liars, they have impossible standards with a weak internet connection and have rigid rules.

Stay away from Axxess at all cost.

reviews.tvSnippet: Got MTN 5G in April 2025 worked well until August 2025. DL speeds were always above 200 Mbps and only dropped below that during some peak hours 18:00 to 21:00. UL speeds were never very good and ranged between 2Mbps and 8Mbps. Since August 2025 the DL speed was throttled to 60 Mbps. I logged a service ticket and it was back to normal for less than a week and the process repeated for about 3 weeks after which my tickets were ignored and the responses changed to the service is not throttled while it is and speed test proof was supplied.

reviews.tvSnippet: I was very disappointed in the service I received. I think I would like to say to anyone wanting to use this provider, first make sure that they really cover your address. I have paid for my router after checking the address to make sure. Only a day after I received a message to say they dont service that specific place and there is no internet lines there. I immediately ask to stop the router delivery because I will obviously not be able  to use it. I asked to get the router refunded, because it wasnt due to my fault. Well I am still waiting for refund.

reviews.tvSnippet:
Terrible Terrible Terrible

They don't go an extra mile for their customers. I logged a fault on the 12th of September about slow to no connection. They resolved it 5 days later, citing a technical fault with vodacom. 4 days later, same problem again. To this day they haven't fixed it. I just asked for an update on their WhatsApp line, the agent tells me "there's no update at this stage" Like, are you kidding me??? Internet is not just for streaming but work and school purposes and they give me that?? Im so tired of them at this point. I paid R699 for services that aren't being rendered. Also, when you choose to leave, they charge R900.
reviews.text:
Terrible Terrible Terrible

They don't go an extra mile for their customers. I logged a fault on the 12th of September about slow to no connection. They resolved it 5 days later, citing a technical fault with vodacom. 4 days later, same problem again. To this day they haven't fixed it. I just asked for an update on their WhatsApp line, the agent tells me "there's no update at this stage" Like, are you kidding me??? Internet is not just for streaming but work and school purposes and they give me that?? Im so tired of them at this point. I paid R699 for services that aren't being rendered. Also, when you choose to leave, they charge R900.

reviews.tvSnippet:
I have been with Axxess for close to five years now. My uptime is steady and speeds are okay. I've never reached promised speeds, but the ones I get are sufficient.

The missing one star is for the live chat when requiring assistance. It is slow. On a chat I waited 4 minutes after type just to get a response that says "one moment". Meaning I was going to wait longer.

reviews.tvSnippet:
I‚Äôve been using Axxess as my internet provider for both my home and my offices for years now, and the experience has been outstanding. The connection is consistently fast and reliable ‚Äî crucial for running my business and keeping my family connected.

I remember when I order for a fiber it‚Äôs was installed on the following day, the Installation was quick, the pricing is fair, and every time I‚Äôve contacted customer service they‚Äôve been prompt, professional and friendly. And the Access App give you real time technical updates so you know exactly what is going on, Axxess really stands out for its combination of speed, reliability and support. I confidently recommend them to anyone looking for dependable internet service for personal or business use.

reviews.tvSnippet: As an avid gamer and someone who streams a lot, a stable connection with low latency is crucial. I joined Axxess in August 2023 and it's been a game-changer. The speeds are fantastic, the ping is consistently low, and I've had no issues with lag or buffering during peak hours. A top-tier service for anyone with heavy internet usage. It's just exactly on par with what I was looking for.

reviews.tvSnippet:
I called Axxess on the evening of 24th July 2025 as I was experiencing performance issues with my wifi. I was advised by the agent (Zanele) that there were issues with the old Tenda routers and that I needed to upgrade to the Huawei AX3 router. She was very efficient and helpful with the whole process of placing my order. She advised  that it would take 3 to 6 working days for my router to be delivered. I told her that I work from home on certain days and need the wifi sorted urgently.

I was pleasantly surprised when I received an e-mail from the courier company on the 25th of July advising they have collected the new router from Axxess for delivery. I received my router on Monday, 28th July 2025 at around 1pm. It was easy to set up and get going. Thanks to the Axxess team for expediting my request so promptly.

reviews.tvSnippet: If I could give Axxess a minus zero I would.  From the start I have received poor service, zero communication. They had the incorrect address, despite sharing it several times.  The connection is not great.  When addressing this with the Manager, he assured I would get a call to resolve. To no surprise this did not happen.  Shocking service and would not recommend.

reviews.tvSnippet: A friend mentioned to me when i asked that i have to move and be independent of my own wifi. She suggested Axxess. We looked at packages and my options that to me should suit my budget. We had such a good way to look at different options Axxess had to offer it was in all areas fitting my budget and as easy as selecting it, the delivery to my new place was done effortless and right through open communication. A month ago I called in and a friendly lady took my call around the weekend of Mother's day and my wifi had hick ups. And she efficiently supported me in a friendly mannerism. I am happy and satisfied with the service. Didn't have issues again yet well executed ro the service departments handling all the calls and errors and issues in support of all the underlining complex people we are. A big thanks team Axxess.

I even recommended my sister to use them and she has upgraded from LTE with Axxess to Fibre with Axxess and she is just as happy as I am. keep up the good work guys!!

reviews.tvSnippet:
Avoid Axxess at all costs ‚Äì absolutely the worst service provider I‚Äôve encountered

Avoid this service provider like the plague. Axxess has been the worst ISP experience I‚Äôve had in South Africa. Over the past five weeks, we‚Äôve dealt with ongoing internet issues‚Äîincluding two full weeks without any service at all‚Äîand received little to no support during that time.

When we finally got assistance from Zukile, we had a brief moment of hope. He was communicative for about a week and promised to stay with us throughout the process until everything was fixed. He even provided a temporary router‚Äîwhich came with its own set of problems‚Äîbut when we asked for help with those issues, it felt like we were being seen as ungrateful or unreasonable for simply needing support.

To try to ease communication, I personally took over from my dad to make Zukile feel more comfortable engaging with me instead. I even reassured him that he could respond by the following workday. Despite this, he began misreading tone from text messages and interpreted my calm, reasonable follow-up as me being pushy or not understanding that he‚Äôs busy. It felt like a complete shift from the initial helpfulness we experienced.

As we neared the end of the process, we stopped receiving updates for over three days. When we tried to follow up, Zukile took offense‚Äîdespite our frustration being entirely justified after weeks of unresolved issues and no clear timeline.

The support system at Axxess is completely unreliable. There are no technicians available to assist in person, and phone support is just as bad. Multiple agents have ended calls mid-support, claiming their shifts were over, and many speak to you with condescension or impatience‚Äîas if you‚Äôre a burden for needing help or trying to understand basic troubleshooting steps.

We are planning on cancelling our line, and honestly, we feel more relief than disappointment. We were still charged half of the monthly service fees despite having no internet connection or service at all. On top of that, I‚Äôve spent over R2,000 on mobile data just to stay online and keep working.

Axxess is a truly horrific service provider. Learn from my mistake‚Äîstay far away.

reviews.tvSnippet:
After being years with Axxess and extremely happy with their service before, I had to delete my previous 5 stars review.

I moved to a different town. They were supposed to sort with their fibre provider in the area to connect my new line. More than 3 weeks and no contact, no follow-up and no feedback, after I followed up with Axxess numerous times. They blamed the fibre provider and Zoom, the fibre provider had no  proper record of the order.

I cancelled everything this morning with Axxess and contacted a different ISP, who got me set up and connected within 4 hours.

Its very disappointing that Axxess service has deteriorated like this. They were a very good ISP before, but never again.

Users should consider their option carefully before considering Axxess.
I won't recommend them to anyone anymore. They won't see me again.
reviews.text:
After being years with Axxess and extremely happy with their service before, I had to delete my previous 5 stars review.

I moved to a different town. They were supposed to sort with their fibre provider in the area to connect my new line. More than 3 weeks and no contact, no follow-up and no feedback, after I followed up with Axxess numerous times. They blamed the fibre provider and Zoom, the fibre provider had no  proper record of the order.

I cancelled everything this morning with Axxess and contacted a different ISP, who got me set up and connected within 4 hours.

Its very disappointing that Axxess service has deteriorated like this. They were a very good ISP before, but never again.

Users should consider their option carefully before considering Axxess.
I won't recommend them to anyone anymore. They won't see me again.

reviews.tvSnippet:
I‚Äôve been with Axxess for just two months, and it‚Äôs been nothing short of a nightmare. I signed up for their 60/60 Mbps fibre to the home month to month package, which according to their website can be cancelled at any time unless part of a promotional deal. I was not on any promotional deal just a standard package that included "free installation" (which, in my case, was literally just them dropping off a router and a configuration guide because the fibre was already installed in my home).

Since day one, the internet has never worked correctly. I‚Äôve logged five support tickets and called their call centre more times than I can count, but the agents have been completely incompetent and unhelpful. I‚Äôve explained repeatedly that certain apps and services like Takealot and Uber simply don‚Äôt work when connected to the Axxess WiFi. The moment I disconnect and use mobile data everything works fine. Clearly, this is an issue with their ISP service or configuration, but no one at Axxess can resolve it.

Now, when I try to cancel due to the ongoing issues, I‚Äôm being told I have to pay a R499 cancellation fee even though I‚Äôm on a month-to-month plan that should allow me to cancel anytime. This is completely unacceptable, misleading, and unethical.

Avoid Axxess at all costs. They promise flexibility and support, but in reality, you‚Äôll get unreliable service, zero accountability, and unexpected fees if you try to leave.

Avoid Axxess at all costs. They promise flexibility and support, but in reality, you‚Äôll get unreliable service, zero accountability, and unexpected fees if you try to leave.

reviews.tvSnippet: I am a new Axxess client after 7 years with previous service provider. I signed up with Axxess and their turnaround time is 2-7 working days for hardware delivery and connection. I explained my dilemma of my current service expiring and my urgent need for connectivity. Although I live in Pretoria and Axxess operates from Port Elizabeth, they had me up and running within less than 48 hrs. Their consultants were also very patient with the internet connectivity process. The Communication from Axxess has been outstanding from day one. The App they provide is also very handy. I am grateful and impressed. Thank you

reviews.tvSnippet:
I was a bit skeptical when our previous service provider advised that they were moving us over to Axxess, as I had not heard of them and I expected the worst. Boy! Was I pleasantly surprised.

I have been using Axxess for a few years now and have had no issues with their service. I'm actually grateful that we were migrated over to Axxess. Even the migration didn't come with any issues. Whenever the line is down, they will advise and if I query, they are generally very quick to assist, together with the fibre provider. They upgraded our line, at no additional cost. which helps when online gaming. The service is one of a kind and I will not change, unless they kick me out. Thank you Axxess! Keep up the great services, which is a breath of fresh air in the current service delivery climate.
reviews.text:
I was a bit skeptical when our previous service provider advised that they were moving us over to Axxess, as I had not heard of them and I expected the worst. Boy! Was I pleasantly surprised.

I have been using Axxess for a few years now and have had no issues with their service. I'm actually grateful that we were migrated over to Axxess. Even the migration didn't come with any issues. Whenever the line is down, they will advise and if I query, they are generally very quick to assist, together with the fibre provider. They upgraded our line, at no additional cost. which helps when online gaming. The service is one of a kind and I will not change, unless they kick me out. Thank you Axxess! Keep up the great services, which is a breath of fresh air in the current service delivery climate.

reviews.tvSnippet: If I could give a zero right now, I would!! I have been trying for almost a MONTH now to get assistance with ALL my domains with you. Your IT team appears incompetent and my issue is STILL not resolved! I am HUGELY frustrated and have not other option but to take it public. I get given the run around, asked to do IT tasks which is NOT my job, I have NEVER received a phone call or an offer to have someone connect to my computer to see what I am talking about...freaking NOTHING!!! I have filed ticket after ticket after ticket and yet, I STILL cannot access my emails OR control panels!!! I am now shopping around for a new provide and will be migrating ALL six my domains to someone who actually gives a damn about a customer who had been with them in excess of SEVEN YEARS!! It appears as if only NEW customers gets customer service and the long standing, loyal ones gets shoved aside. Feel free to check all my service tickets and feel my frustration. My issue I logged on 17 January is STILL NOT RESOLVED. Your service sucks! I'm paying good money each month but I've now had ENOUGH!! I'm leaving for someone else and you will never get my business again! I had recommended you to DOZENS of people but will most certainly not put them through this!! Cheers!

reviews.tvSnippet:
I've not had any issues since joining Axxess. My initial experience with them was seamless and professional. Communication between Axxess and myself was clear, helpful and precise.
I'm very satisfied with their service and product, and their pricing is as good as it gets.
I have no reason not to give them 5 star rating.

reviews.tvSnippet:
Getting superb service is rare nowadays. Wish more companies would copy yours. Your team always answers the phone quickly, are always able to assist, and quick, and explain everything well. Customer service is rare to find in general, but you guys are truly a gem. I can honestly not make any improvement suggestions.
Thank you Axxess! Keep it up.
Highly recommend you.

reviews.tvSnippet:
*Exceptional Service!*

I recently received my router from Axxess, and I'm blown away by their exceptional service! From order confirmation to delivery, I was kept informed every step of the way. The communication was clear, and the delivery was prompt. The team's professionalism and attention to detail made the entire experience hassle-free. I highly recommend Axxess for their outstanding service!

reviews.tvSnippet: The lady by the name of Rita at customer service, gave me good advice when i was enquiring regarding the product. I struggle a little to do the activation, Rita didnt had the full knowledge to assist me over the phone, but she did advice me to contact Vodacom. She did follow up with me to see if i was making progress. I do think  the company can try to give more basic IT training  then the staff would have been equipped to give correct support.  But overaƒ∫l i am happy with the service  and will suggest it to my friend.

reviews.tvSnippet: I received excellent service from the team at Axxess. Transitioning from another provider was smooth, and they consistently updated me on the status of my line activation. I am quite impressed so far and confident that I made the right choice. Keep it up!

reviews.tvSnippet:
I've been using Axxess Internet Service for several months now, and I couldn't be happier with the performance and reliability. The connection is consistently fast and stable, making streaming, gaming, and working from home a breeze. Their customer support is top-notch, always responsive and helpful with any queries or issues. The installation process was smooth and efficient, and the overall value for money is exceptional. Axxess has truly exceeded my expectations, and I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a dependable internet service provider.

Thanks for providing such a great service!

reviews.tvSnippet: AXXESS is the best I have ever used, I am always online it means I never go out of connection. The internet is super fast. I will always recommend access the coverage is in most of the towns. I am mostly in North West, Northern Cape and Free State but I never lose connection that's how strong our connection is between me and Axxess. Tried it and experience the best connection that will never go offline.

reviews.tvSnippet: Excellent online customer service response. I first heard of you from my former employee about 2 years ago. I've just subscribed to your service and everything is swift and easy to setup with you guys. Everything was delivered on time. Thank you Axxess, I'm ready to start my online store. Got my internet, VOIP, UPS and computers running. Thank you
